instruction: Predict what effects the COVID-19 pandemic may have on the future of work.
output: The COVID-19 pandemic is likely to have long-lasting effects on the future of work. Many companies have shifted to remote work, leading to a decline in office space and a rise in technology-driven workplaces. Additionally, job security concerns have increased and many people have found themselves without a job or financial security. It is also likely that the pandemic will create a shift towards more “gig” jobs and freelance work, as well as an increase in the use of automation and artificial intelligence in the workplace.
